trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There was one other sighting in Atlanta on or around November 16th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsLooked out of window on sunday morning ag 6:30 AM saw a blue, silver object flying behind trees. It moved a treetop level ,stopped and then moved toward Pleasantdale rd. I watched it for about 4 minutes. It was moving slow and then fast. I somehow knew it was there ,it always is in the same area. I never really expect it , I just know..it was the size of a baseball.
Summary: Looked out window saw a blue-silver disc shaped object behind trees. It was revolving.
